arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid vs Elche – Predicted Lineup and Team News
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid continue their La Liga campaign with a home fixture against newly-promoted Elche at the Riyadh Air Metropolitano on Saturday. After a disappointing 2-1 defeat to Espanyol on the opening day, Diego Simeone’s side will look to bounce back against a side eager to prove they belong in the top flight.
